update SF_CULPRIT_LAW
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTIGATE_ORG = #{investigateOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIN_DATE = #{detainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTER_DATE = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARREST_ORG = #{arrestOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARREST_DATE = #{arrestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVEST_OVER_DATE = #{investOverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECK_ORG = #{checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDICTMENT_NUM = #{indictmentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDICTMENT_DATE = #{indictmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXECUTE_NOTIFICATION_DATE = #{executeNotificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXECUTE_NOTIFICATION_NUM = #{executeNotificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEGAL_DOCS_UPLOAD_DATE = #{legalDocsUploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIC_WSLX_KEY = #{dicWslxKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_DOCS_PATH = #{legalDocsPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_DOCS_NAME = #{legalDocsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_DOCS_START_DATE = #{legalDocsStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEGAL_DOCS_RECEIVE_T = #{legalDocsReceiveT,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISPATCH_DATE = #{dispatchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MAIN_DEPT = #{mainDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COPY_DEPT = #{copyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAFTER = #{drafter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSER = #{passer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_ADMINISTRATION_RECORD = #{oldAdministrationRecord,jdbcType=CLOB},
OLD_PENAL_RECORD = #{oldPenalRecord,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_CULPRIT_LAW set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVESTIGATE_ORG = #{investigateOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIN_DATE = #{detainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGISTER_DATE = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ARREST_ORG = #{arrestOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARREST_DATE = #{arrestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVEST_OVER_DATE = #{investOverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECK_ORG = #{checkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDICTMENT_NUM = #{indictmentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDICTMENT_DATE = #{indictmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXECUTE_NOTIFICATION_DATE = #{executeNotificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXECUTE_NOTIFICATION_NUM = #{executeNotificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEGAL_DOCS_UPLOAD_DATE = #{legalDocsUploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIC_WSLX_KEY = #{dicWslxKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_DOCS_PATH = #{legalDocsPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_DOCS_NAME = #{legalDocsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_DOCS_START_DATE = #{legalDocsStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEGAL_DOCS_RECEIVE_T = #{legalDocsReceiveT,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DISPATCH_DATE = #{dispatchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAIN_DEPT = #{mainDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COPY_DEPT = #{copyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRAFTER = #{drafter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSER = #{passer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_ADMINISTRATION_RECORD = #{oldAdministrationRecord,jdbcType=CLOB}, OLD_PENAL_RECORD = #{oldPenalRecord,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
